name: modelValue
description: Main model to Opens/Closes the component. Use this together with the @update:modelValue event or use v-model.

description.content: Contain the dialog inside the immediate parent element.
Note! The containing parent must have a position of relative.

name: persistent
description: Prevent dialog closing when clicking on the backdrop. (Must be manually closed: set "modelValue" to false)

name: seamless
description: Removes the backdrop and allows the parent to scroll

description.content: Sets the container element to have 100% width & height.
Note! You're still required to give the child component explicit dimensions (100% width & height) to fill the dialog.
Sets the container element to have 100% width.
Note! You're still required to give the child component explicit width (100%) to fill the dialog's width.
Sets the container element to have 100% height.
Note! You're still required to give the child component explicit height (100%) to fill the dialog's height.
Note! This feature is experimental and may cause some performance hit. Use at your own risk!
Blurs the children of the parent element.

name: position
description: The position of the dialog's child component.

name: transition
description: The transition name to use when presenting the child component.
